title: Elegant Riyadh Self-Contained Apartments & Suites with Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
description:
Discover a sanctuary of luxury in Riyadh’s Al Sahafah district, where modernity intertwines with cultural heritage at this towering 35-storey abode. Savour jaw-dropping views from the rooftop infinity pool overlooking the city's skyline and indulge in wellness at the state-of-the-art fitness centre, while children can stay busy with activities at the Falcon Kids' Club.

Culinary enthusiasts will relish the diverse dining options at Ramla Terraza, featuring renowned establishments like CLAP, Brute, Iris Café and Jones the Grocer. After a day of exploring Riyadh's nearby cultural gems and glitzy malls, retreat to your plush apartment or suite, equipped with all chic amenities for a truly luxurious city break.
offer_address: 7713 King Fahad Road, Al Sahafah District, Riyadh, 13329, Saudi Arabia

title: Elegant Riyadh Escape Steps from Kingdom Centre with Indoor Pool
description:
Retreat to Saudi Arabia’s vibrant capital with a stay at this elegant hotel in the heart of Riyadh. Just steps from the iconic Kingdom Centre, the hotel features stylish rooms, a heated indoor pool and a modern fitness centre for your relaxation. Enjoy international cuisine at La Croisette or unwind with a coffee in the cosy lounge.

With top attractions like Al Faisaliah Mall, the National Museum,and the historic Masmak Fortress nearby, you're perfectly positioned to discover the city's rich culture. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, the hotel’s prime location makes it the ideal base for your Riyadh stay.
offer_address: 9033 King Fahd Road Tower 1, Olaya, Riyadh 12214, Saudi Arabia

title: North Riyadh Mövenpick Residences with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Mövenpick Hotel and Residences Riyadh puts you right where the magic happens in Saudi Arabia's dynamic capital. You're positioned to soak up Riyadh's incredible transformation, with the Kingdom's business districts, cultural landmarks and shopping destinations all within easy reach.

Melt your stress away at the spa, enjoy cutting-edge fitness facilities, or relax in the pool. Indulge in a range of flavours at several restaurants, from international culinary delights to fine-dining experiences, all with Mövenpick's legendary Swiss hospitality.
offer_address: 3478 North Ring Road Exit 4, Al Ghadeer District, Riyadh 13311, Saudi Arabia

title: Glamorous Riyadh Escape with Onsite Dining, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the epitome of luxury in the heart of Saudi Arabia's bustling capital with a stay at this prestigious hotel. Located in the Business Gate community, this hotel is a stone's throw from Riyadh's thriving financial district and the National Museum's treasure trove of Arabian artefacts.

Indulge in a wealth of world-class amenities, including the tranquil Willow Stream Spa, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a selection of gourmet dining options. Venture out to explore the city's vibrant souks or simply relax in the hotel's opulent surroundings, enjoying the glittering cityscape views.
offer_address: Business Gate Qurtubah Area Airport Road, Riyadh 11552, Saudi Arabia

title: Riyadh Elegant Escape in Metropolitan Oasis with Outdoor Pool
description: Wander along the date palm-lined streets of Saudi Arabia’s metropolitan capital, with a stay at Crowne Plaza Riyadh Minhal, an IHG Hotel. Gaze above at the glittering skyscrapers and make the most of your time in this urban oasis - whether that involves tasting eclectic plates or indulging in high-end shopping. Back at the hotel, you’ll find an alluring menu of international cuisine at Silk Road Restaurant and a moment of much-needed respite at the dazzling outdoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Minhal, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: InterContinental Durrat Al Riyadh Resort & Spa
title: Five-Star Riyadh Oasis with Infinity Pool & Spa
description: Surrounded by a lush verdant oasis, the five-star InterContinental Durrat Al Riyadh Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel, is an opulent haven of stylish and exquisite rooms and suites hidden amid 154,000sqm of sprawling greenery. Visit the Desert Palm restaurant to experience world-class dining that blends traditional and global flavours, indulge in a sweet treat at the Oasis terrace cafe overlooking the infinity edge pool, or reinvigorate yourself at the spa or fully equipped fitness centre.
location_description: InterContinental Durrat Al Riyadh Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: King Fahd Road, Exit 6, Durrat, Riyadh Saudi Arabia 11566

title: Riyadh Central Sophistication with Three Restaurants, Pool & Garden Terrace
description:
Discover comfort and convenience at Novotel Riyadh Sahafa, thoughtfully located in the bustling business district. Stylish rooms offer a refreshing retreat, with contemporary furnishings and finishing touches that make all the difference. Sample specialty Greek cuisine, or head to the garden terrace for delicious meals, mocktails and light bites.

Minutes from upscale shopping venues, this hotel puts you right where you need to be. When yo retreat to the hotel after a day of exploration, take a dip in the outdoor pool, relax in the sauna or work your muscles at the on-site fitness centre. Evening relaxation comes naturally in the welcoming lounge areas, perfect for unwinding with a refreshing beverage.
offer_address: Olaya Street, As Sahafa District, Riyadh 13321, Saudi Arabia

title: Saudi Arabia Five-Star Oasis in the Heart of Riyadh with Four Onsite Restaurants
description: Escape to one of Saudi Arabia’s wealthiest cities and experience authentic Middle Eastern luxury at InterContinental Riyadh, an IHG Hotel. This oasis is perfectly set near Riyadh’s top attractions - including Riyadh Zoo and the Kingdom Centre skyscraper - making it the perfect launchpad to explore the vast culture and history of the city. Take time to relax after a day of sightseeing at one of the lavish pools or indulge in a well-deserved cocktail with dinner at your choice of four onsite restaurants.
offer_address: King Saud Rd, Al Mutamarat, Riyadh 11481, Saudi Arabia

title: Riyadh Refined Hotel in the Heart of the City
description: Ideally situated to explore this cosmopolitan city, Crowne Plaza Riyadh Al Waha, an IHG Hotel, is an urban refuge from the hustle and bustle of the capital. Beat the heat with a refreshing dip in the pool or revitalise with a soothing treatment at the spa. Sample delicious dishes at Oasis Restaurant or satisfy your sweet tooth at Bouvardia Lounge with a dessert and coffee before venturing out to experience Riyadh's many attractions.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Al Waha, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 8430 Uthman Ibn Affan Road, Al Waha, Riyadh 12443, Saudi Arabia

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Rdc Hotel & Convention
title: Stylish Riyadh City Break in the Heart of Digital City with Outdoor Pool
description: Enter the future and experience Digital City from the comfort of your metropolitan oasis, with a stay at Crowne Plaza Riyadh RDC Hotel & Convention, an IHG Hotel. With the awe-inspiring city of Ridyah at your doorstep, explore all that the dazzling capital of Saudi Arabia has to offer. Discover world-class retail, smarter services and advanced technology at the world-class Digital City. During your stay, retreat to KOI for Japanese-Peruvian fine dining or laze by the hotel’s glamorous outdoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Riyadh RDC Hotel & Convention, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Wady Al Muaydin Street Unit 4, Imam Saud Ibn Abdul Aziz Road, Riyadh 12382, Saudi Arabia

title: Saudi Arabia Refined Riyadh Refuge in City Centre
description: At the heart of Saudi Arabia's capital, Crowne Plaza Riyadh Palace, an IHG Hotel, is a refined urban retreat free from the hustle and bustle of the city. Savour a range of global cuisines in comfort at the Palace poolside restaurant. Escape the heat by plunging into the crystal clear outdoor pool, keep your body energised at the fitness centre or set out to explore heritage attractions, vibrant shopping malls and fascinating museums and libraries.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Palace, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Prince Abdul Rahman Bin Abdul Aziz Street, Riyadh 11461, Saudi Arabia

title: Five-Star Riyadh Arabian Escape with Renowned Sky-High Restaurant
description: Set in the vibrant Al Olaya District of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, you’ll find the five-star Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh - a luxurious haven of timeless elegance, opulent interiors, gourmet dining and exceptional service. Experience the epitome of luxurious hospitality at this exquisite hotel perfectly positioned near the city's best sights. Be sure to visit each of the nine restaurants for a unique and stylish dining experience, including authentic international dishes at La Brasserie, visit The Globe - the iconic golden sphere atop Al Faisaliah Tower - for a sky-high experience or sip on refreshing cocktails at the stylish Mandarin Lounge. Later, visit the Men's Health Club or indulge like never before at the ladies-only Al Faisalian Spa, where a 16-metre indoor pool and a fully-equipped fitness centre await.
offer_address: King Fahad Road, Al Olaya, Riyadh 12212, Saudi Arabia

title: Contemporary Riyadh City Break near Kingdom Tower with Restaurant, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the best of Riyadh with a stay at the elegant Novotel Suites Riyadh Centre. Ideally located between Riyadh’s vibrant business and shopping districts, this contemporary stay caters to both business travellers and holidaymakers alike.

Step outside and find the city’s top attractions just moments away: from the awe-inspiring SkyBridge, atop Kingdom Tower, to the historic Masmak Fortress and the immersive National Museum. After a day exploring Saudi Arabia's vibrant capital, return to the hotel for a refreshing dip in the indoor swimming pool or indulge in a revitalising treatment at the onsite spa.
offer_address: 90 Off Olaya Street, Riyadh, 11361, Saudi Arabia
